title: Critical Patch for Email Gateway
summary: Defender-first guidance based on aggregated signals. No specific indicators are disclosed.
what_to_do_now: Apply the latest vendor patch.
Disable exposed services until patched.
Enforce multi-factor authentication on all accounts.
Increase monitoring on affected systems for 14 days.
who_is_affected: Organizations operating common enterprise systems across Government, Counties, and CNI.
how_to_check: Review system logs for unusual authentication attempts.
Scan for unexpected processes or scheduled tasks.
Verify software versions match vendor-fixed builds.
